radiographic_examinations.findings: Presumed atelectasis noted in bilateral lung bases; several subcentimeter cysts within the liver; pancreatic parenchyma demonstrates normal signal intensity with no focal mass; no dilated pancreatic duct; trace amount of fluid surrounding the liver and spleen; chronic amount of fluid along the caudate lobe; no lymph node enlargement.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight increase in fluid surrounding the caudate lobe compared to prior studies, probably due to recent inflammation; somewhat distended appearance of the jejunal pancreaticobiliary limb is unchanged over multiple studies.
